item.title: Mahout@TU WS 09/10
item.description: Mahout@TU WS 09/10 # Title: Mahout@TU WS 09/10 There is going to be a project/seminar course at TU Berlin on Apache Mahout. The goal is to introduce students to the work on a free software project, interact with the community and build production ready software. Students will be given several potential tasks ranging from optimizing existing implementations, implementing new algorithms and (depending on their prior knowledge) improving, scaling and parallelizing existing algorithms.
